1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti'</e> <pb/><t>A Jehová max alon bay cham wajawil: Ayan chotan bay in watx' k'ab ti' masantac'al ok wacan oc eb ajc'ul oc en batxlubok akan, ẍi Jehová.</t>
2: <pb/><t>A yuj Jehová ok el yich ekbej bay Sión, masantac'al bay lajub tx'otx'. Ak' cuenta eb ajc'ul oc en, ẍi Cham.</t>
3: <t>A yet ok ak'on owal yetok eb ajc'ul, ok jay a conob ayach, yuj ul yaon oc ba yin yak'on owal. Axca wal yal ak'bal yet k'inibalil, axca tu' ok yun jay eb nak ach'ej ayach bay tzalan yet ayilal.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Max yak' Jehová is ti', cax c'am bak'in ok q'uexa'; yalnak Cham axca ti': Sacerdote ach yin tojbalk'inal, axca yopiso Melquisedec, ẍi Cham.</t>
5: <pb/><t>A bay a watx' k'ab ayic' Jehová. Yet jun c'ual ok caktzaj tit yowal Cham, ok yuch c'ay Cham eb rey.</t>
6: <t>Ok yak' Cham lowbanilej yin eb mimek conob, ok cam anima yuj Cham yinxa bulanil; xiwil eb yajaw ok yak' c'aycan el Cham bay yulyibank'inal ti'.</t>
7: <t>A yul be ok yuc'a' cham rey bay jun aej, cax ok occan yip cham yuj a'.</t>
